title: STAT+: Federal government turns to fresher data to rein in Medicare Advantage upcoding
description: CMS is taking a new approach to limit one of the ways insurers are boosting profits in Medicare Advantage.
content: CMS is taking a new approach to limit one of the ways insurers are boosting profits in Medicare Advantage.
